00060         function generateModulePDF($records,$exportFields = array()) {
00061                 
00062                 //init pdf object
00063                 $this->pdf = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Template_PDF");
00064                 $addedOneRecord = false;
00065                 
00066                 //for all records,
00067                 //check if the record is valid.
00068                 //a valid record has at least one param to export
00069                 //if no valid record is found render an error message in pdf file 
00070                 foreach($records as $data) {
00071                         $valid = false;
00072                         if(isset($data['params']) && is_array($data['params'])) {
00073                                 foreach($data['params'] as $key=>$value) {
00074                                         if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields)) {
00075                                                 $valid = true;
00076                                         }
00077                                 }
00078                         }
00079                         if($valid) {
00080                                 $addedOneRecord = true;
00081                                 $this->pdf->AliasNbPages();
00082                                 $this->pdf->AddPage();
00083                                 $this->pdf->SetFont('Arial','',12);
00084                                 $standardWidth = 100;
00085                                 $nameWidth = 70;
00086                                 $valueWidth = 70;
00087                                 $feedWidth = 30;
00088                                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("pid",$exportFields)) {
00089                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Page-ID:",0,0);
00090                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",$data['pid'],0,1);
00091                                 }
00092                                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("submission_date",$exportFields)) {
00093                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Submission date:",0,0);
00094                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",date("d.m.Y H:i:s",$data['crdate']),0,1);
00095                                 }
00096                                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("ip",$exportFields)) {
00097                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","IP address:",0,0);
00098                                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",$data['ip'],0,1);
00099                                 }
00100                         
00101                                 $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Submitted values:",0,1);
00102                                 $this->pdf->SetLineWidth(.3);
00103                                 $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00104                                 $this->pdf->SetFillColor(255,255,255);
00105                                 $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6","Name",'B',0,'C',true);
00106                                 $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6","Value",'B',0,'C',true);
00107                                 $this->pdf->Ln();
00108                                 $this->pdf->SetFillColor(200,200,200);
00109                                 $fill = false;
00110                         
00111                                 foreach($data['params'] as $key=>$value) {
00112                                         if(is_array($value) && (count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields))) {
00113                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00114                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6",$key,0,0,'L',$fill);
00115                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",array_shift($value),0,0,'L',$fill);
00116                                                 $this->pdf->Ln();
00117                                                 foreach($value as $v) {
00118                                                         $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00119                                                         $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6","",0,0,'L',$fill);
00120                                                         $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",$v,0,0,'L',$fill);
00121                                                         $this->pdf->Ln();
00122                                                 }
00123                                                 $fill = !$fill;
00124                                         } elseif(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields)) {
00125                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00126                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6",$key,0,0,'L',$fill);
00127                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",$value,0,0,'L',$fill);
00128                                                 $this->pdf->Ln();
00129                                                 $fill = !$fill;
00130                                         }
00131                                         
00132                                 }
00133                         }
00134                 }
00135                 
00136                 //if no valid record was found, render an error message
00137                 if(!$addedOneRecord) {
00138                         $this->pdf->AliasNbPages();
00139                                 $this->pdf->AddPage();
00140                                 $this->pdf->SetFont('Arial','',12);
00141                         $this->pdf->Cell(300,100,"No valid records found! Try to select more fields to export!",0,0,'L');
00142                 }
00143                 $this->pdf->Output();
00144 
00145         }
00146 
00159         function generateFrontendPDF($gp,$langFile,$exportFields = array(),$file = "",$returns = false) {
00160                 $this->pdf = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Template_PDF");
00161                 $this->pdf->AliasNbPages();
00162                 $this->pdf->AddPage();
00163                 $this->pdf->SetFont('Arial','',12);
00164                 $standardWidth = 100;
00165                 $nameWidth = 70;
00166                 $valueWidth = 70;
00167                 $feedWidth = 30;
00168                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("pid",$exportFields)) {
00169                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Page-ID:",0,0);
00170                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,0,1);
00171                 }
00172                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("submission_date",$exportFields)) {
00173                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Submission date:",0,0);
00174                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",date("d.m.Y H:i:s",time()),0,1);
00175                 }
00176                 if(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array("ip",$exportFields)) {
00177                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","IP address:",0,0);
00178                         $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15",t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR'),0,1);
00179                 }
00180                 $this->pdf->Cell($standardWidth,"15","Submitted values:",0,1);
00181                 if(isset($gp) && is_array($gp)) {
00182                         $this->pdf->SetLineWidth(.3);
00183                         $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00184                         $this->pdf->SetFillColor(255,255,255);
00185                         $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6","Name",'B',0,'C',true);
00186                         $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6","Value",'B',0,'C',true);
00187                         $this->pdf->Ln();
00188                         $this->pdf->SetFillColor(200,200,200);
00189                         $fill = false;
00190                         unset($gp['renderMethod']);
00191                         foreach($gp as $key=>$value) {
00192                                 if(is_array($value) && (count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields))) {
00193                                         $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00194                                         $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6",trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$langFile.':'.$key)),0,0,'L',$fill);
00195                                         $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",array_shift($value),0,0,'L',$fill);
00196                                         $this->pdf->Ln();
00197                                         foreach($value as $v) {
00198                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00199                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6","",0,0,'L',$fill);
00200                                                 $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",$v,0,0,'L',$fill);
00201                                                 $this->pdf->Ln();
00202                                         }
00203                                         $fill = !$fill;
00204                                 } elseif(count($exportFields) == 0 || in_array($key,$exportFields)) {
00205                                         $this->pdf->Cell($feedWidth);
00206                                         $this->pdf->Cell($nameWidth,"6",trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$langFile.':'.$key)),0,0,'L',$fill);
00207                                         $this->pdf->Cell($valueWidth,"6",$value,0,0,'L',$fill);
00208                                         $this->pdf->Ln();
00209                                         $fill = !$fill;
00210                                 }
00211                                 
00212                         }
00213                 }
00214 
00215                 if(strlen($file) > 0) {
00216                         $this->pdf->Output($file, 'F');
00217                         $downloadpath = $file;
00218                         if($returns) {
00219                                 return $downloadpath;
00220                         }
00221                         header('Location: '.$downloadpath);
00222                 } else {
00223                         $this->pdf->Output();
00224                 }
00225 
00226         }
00227 }
